00230         int i, err = -1;
00231         int cards_num = 0;

00234 
00235         doc = xmlParseFile (file);
00236         if (!doc)

00238

00248                 goto exit;
00249         }

00252         i = 0;

00254                 if ((!xmlStrcmp(cur->name, (const xmlChar *)"Card"))){

00260                         DECODE_XML_PROP_INT(all_cards[i].type, cur, "Type");

00267                                 goto exit;
00268                         }

00286                 }
